* is an [overlord to its kind](/wiki/M2_PRINCE "M2 PRINCE").
* is female.
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* can [follow](/wiki/Follower "Follower") you to other levels.

| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | [SLASH'EM\_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line1560](/wiki/SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line1560 "SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/monst.c") |

**Shelob** is a unique arachnid added in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") that appears on her [Special Level](/wiki/The_Spider_Caves "The Spider Caves") along with [Girtab](/wiki/Girtab "Girtab"). She possesses powerful melee attacks (one of which is [poisoned](/wiki/Poison "Poison")), but otherwise has no special abilities. She resists petrification and poison, and her corpse is guaranteed to convey poison resistance.

## Strategy

Like [Girtab](/wiki/Girtab "Girtab"), Shelob is unlikely to be a major threat to most characters that can reach the Spider Caves. However, less experienced characters who are dipping into the Caves to retrieve the guaranteed [speed boots](/wiki/Speed_boots "Speed boots") there will want to be cautious. Shelob does respect [Elbereth](/wiki/Elbereth "Elbereth") and [scrolls of scare monster](/wiki/Scroll_of_scare_monster "Scroll of scare monster").

## Origin

[![Wikipedia](/images/thumb/f/f8/Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png/50px-Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png)](/wiki/File:Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png "Wikipedia")

[Wikipedia](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page "wikipedia:Main Page") has an article about:

***[Shelob](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shelob "wikipedia:Shelob")***

Shelob comes from the Tolkien Universe. She is a huge spider who attacks Frodo and Sam at Cirith Ungol as they enter Mordor. One of the most ancient creatures in Middle-Earth, she is older even than Sauron, being the last child of Ungoliant, the giant spider who helped Melkor to kill the Two Trees of Valinor which lit the world. Unlike most other "evil" creatures in the Third Age, she is not under Sauron's control.

## Encyclopedia Entry

...Great horns she had, and behind her short stalk-like neck  
was her huge swollen body, a vast bloated bag, swaying and  
sagging between her legs; its great bulk was black, blotched  
with livid marks, but the belley underneath was pale and  
luminous and gave forth a stench. Her legs were bent, with  
great knobbed joints high above her back, and hairs that stuck  
out like steel spines, and at each leg's end there was a claw.  
\[ The Two Towers, by J.R.R. Tolkien ]
html:
Shelob

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
s Shelob
Difficulty 31
Attacks Bite 8d4, Bite 5d4 poison
s Shelob
Difficulty 31
Attacks

Bite 8d4, Bite 5d4 poison

Base level 26
Base experience 1120
Speed 15
Base AC 3
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) Unique
Genocidable No
Weight 500
Nutritional value 150
Size Large
Resistances poison, petrification
Resistances conveyed poison (100%)

Shelob:

  • has no hands.
  • is an animal.
  • can lay eggs.
  • is poisonous to eat.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is an overlord to its kind.
  • is female.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • can follow you to other levels.
  • is nasty.
  • is strong.
  • cannot be tamed.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line1560

Shelob is a unique arachnid added in SLASH'EM that appears on her Special Level along with Girtab. She possesses powerful melee attacks (one of which is poisoned), but otherwise has no special abilities. She resists petrification and poison, and her corpse is guaranteed to convey poison resistance.

Strategy

Like Girtab, Shelob is unlikely to be a major threat to most characters that can reach the Spider Caves. However, less experienced characters who are dipping into the Caves to retrieve the guaranteed speed boots there will want to be cautious. Shelob does respect Elbereth and scrolls of scare monster.

Origin

Wikipedia has an article about:
Shelob

Shelob comes from the Tolkien Universe. She is a huge spider who attacks Frodo and Sam at Cirith Ungol as they enter Mordor. One of the most ancient creatures in Middle-Earth, she is older even than Sauron, being the last child of Ungoliant, the giant spider who helped Melkor to kill the Two Trees of Valinor which lit the world. Unlike most other "evil" creatures in the Third Age, she is not under Sauron's control.

Encyclopedia Entry

...Great horns she had, and behind her short stalk-like neck
was her huge swollen body, a vast bloated bag, swaying and
sagging between her legs; its great bulk was black, blotched
with livid marks, but the belley underneath was pale and
luminous and gave forth a stench. Her legs were bent, with
great knobbed joints high above her back, and hairs that stuck
out like steel spines, and at each leg's end there was a claw.
[ The Two Towers, by J.R.R. Tolkien ]

She possesses powerful melee attacks (one of which is [[poison]]ed), but otherwise has no special abilities.  She resists petrification and poison, and her corpse is guaranteed to convey poison resistance.

==Strategy==

Like [[Girtab]], Shelob is unlikely to be a major threat to most characters that can reach the Spider Caves.  However, less experienced characters who are dipping into the Caves to retrieve the guaranteed [[speed boots]] there will want to be cautious.  Shelob does respect [[Elbereth]] and [[scroll of scare monster|scrolls of scare monster]].

Unlike most other "evil" creatures in the Third Age, she is not under Sauron's control.
